title: How to Make Rum Punch

steps.headline: Mix Kilo Kai or other rum, lemon juice and grenadine in shaker with ice.
Pour into glass and top with club soda.
Garnish with orange and lemon slices.
Pre-chill the glasses.
steps.description: Place them in the refrigerator at least half an hour before making the punch.

steps.headline: Place the mango purée or frozen mango into the blender.
Add the lemon juice, cardamom spice and rum.
Blend everything together.
steps.description: Keep blending until the mixture turns smooth.

steps.headline: Add ice if wished.
steps.description: This is optional if you feel it's already cold enough.

steps.headline: Top with a garnish.
steps.description: Cardamom seeds are nice, or a mint leaf or two.

text: Simple rum punch Mix Kilo Kai or other rum, lemon juice and grenadine in shaker with ice.  Pour into glass and top with club soda.  Garnish with orange and lemon slices.  Mango rum punch Pre-chill the glasses. Place them in the refrigerator at least half an hour before making the punch. Place the mango purée or frozen mango into the blender.  Add the lemon juice, cardamom spice and rum.  Add 4 to 6 ice cubes.  Blend everything together. Keep blending until the mixture turns smooth. Strain into the chilled glasses.  Add ice if wished. This is optional if you feel it's already cold enough. Top with a garnish. Cardamom seeds are nice, or a mint leaf or two.
